query:
-- Cliente Hapvida
SELECT 
  'CLIENTE_HAPVIDA' as tipo,
  id as tenantId,
  name,
  cnpj
FROM tenants
WHERE name LIKE '%Hapvida%' OR name LIKE '%hapvida%'

UNION ALL

-- Estoque do produto 401460P
SELECT 
  'ESTOQUE_401460P' as tipo,
  i.tenantId,
  t.name,
  CAST(SUM(i.quantity - i.reservedQuantity) AS CHAR) as disponivel
FROM inventory i
LEFT JOIN tenants t ON i.tenantId = t.id
LEFT JOIN products p ON i.productId = p.id
WHERE p.sku = '401460P'
GROUP BY i.tenantId, t.name;
